title: RPG服如何把玩家的权限禁止了？
author: alkigh321

replies.author: Krito
replies.txt_content:
alkigh321 发表于 2015-3-21 20:56
我输入了
/mangdelp builder essentials.tpa
/mangdelp builder essentials.spawn
/mangaddp builder -essentials.tpa
记得前面的横线

replies.author: alkigh321
replies.txt_content:
我输入了
/mangdelp builder essentials.tpa
/mangdelp builder essentials.spawn
/mangdelp builder essentials.back
/mangdelp builder essentials.hat
没用
服务器就出现这么串英文：The group dosen't have direct access to taht permission
求解答

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
alkigh321 发表于 2015-3-21 13:56
我输入了
/mangdelp builder essentials.tpa
/mangdelp builder essentials.spawn
builder的权限都在 权限组插件的 globalgroup 文件里面 你进去
找到 builder的权限 然后删除就行
